title: Can Leblanc get the Rengar treatment
body: I'm not going to jump on that "ADCs are better assassins than assassins" tirade, but it would be nice for LB to actually do her job well and without so many annoying delays. Her kit is kind of unforgiving (as it should be for an assassin, high risk, high reward). However, as LB I feel like I have to be better than my opponent in most aspects and my timings to do decently on her. I don't mind losing the wave clear.

I don't play LB, but I think the delay part of her kit is extremely awkward. She needs another rework that removes it and adds in some other element to reward players for properly landing their spells. I'd really like for Riot to make more use out of the deceiving theme she has. More than just her R and W that is.
